TopicTitle: Quick Save / Load changed my velocity

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I noticed a new (maybe :)) bug in 1.1:

I was flying towards Mun, and MechJeb did something thats new to 1.1, probably also a bug. If I create a node, it does not show the necessary dV. I saw yesterday that this is "fixed" if I do a quick save and then reload it. But now I was coming in to Mun, and after the quick load, I suddenly have a velocity of 1900 m/s... way more than I had before. Now I have barely enough to get into orbit and back to Kerbin. Was planning to land

 

The ksp log shows this:
